title: HELP   My Account has been stolen (Account name: GamerzLeague)
body:
PLEASE HELP ME. I Have been trying to get onto my Smurf account and the username or password is invalid everytime i try to get onto it. Luckily I still have this account. If a League of Legends Staff can help that will be Great. 

Sincerely, Very Sad Amumu Sajjad123{{champion:32}}

replies.body: I got it back thank the riot gods!
My main account was just stolen they renamed my account to onac this is so depressing. And Im so close to diamond.
